summary: Harry Potter is a badass hoe, here are the receipts / some of his quirks
body:
Harry Potter is a badass hoe, here are the receipts / some of his quirks

  • He is very passionate about the environment. Save the bees!
  • He likes to be tidy.
  • He’s very bad with kids, but he can’t stop himself from playing with them/holding them.
  • The only kids he’s good with are Teddy and the next Weasley Granger generation.
  • He was scouted as a model when he was living in Muggle London after finishing Hogwarts. He did a few shoots here and there. Draco felt a few things here and there.
  • He loves Game of Thrones.
  • His office is full of indoor plants.
  • He is a great cook. But he won’t cook for just anyone.
  • His hair seems messy but is the softest thing to touch. According to Mrs Weasley and Draco, it’s like touching a cloud.
  • When he’s super stressed he tends to smoke a few cigarettes.
  • He knew all the shady ways of acquiring liquor when they were in Hogwarts. No one knew how and where he got it all. He still hasn’t told anyone.
  • Once when he was very sad and didn’t want to talk to anyone, he watched four movies back to back in the theatre and when he walked out he ran into Draco who was with a date. Draco was distracted his entire date then, and cut it short to go knock on Harry’s apartment and ask him “what is bloody wrong with you? You look like you are no more a human.”
  • He then made him coffee and left in an hour when Harry refused to tell him anything. He did thank him for the “terrible black thing”
  • He hates coffee. Hates it.
  • He is very fashion conscious but only with himself.
  • Others think that since he has a great taste in fashion (and otherwise) he’d help them buy good clothes but he just makes them buy the most outrageous combinations of clothes and then laughs at them.
  • He’s good at chess, thanks to Ron.
  • He’s also good at tying a cherry stem with his tongue.
  • He hates touching. He won’t touch you even if you are dipped in gold. Unless you’re Draco or Hermione or Ron or Luna. Then he’ll touch you anyways especially Draco
  • Luna is the one he turns to whenever it seems to get worse. Why? Because she doesn’t ask questions, and charms the whole room to seem like he’s lying in the middle of the forest and there are butterflies all around him. Or if he’s feeling strong enough, they go to a real forest.
  • His favourite curse words are “bitch”, “dickwad”, “lumpy piece of moldy bread” (very specific) and “fucking cumslut”
  • His favorite part of the day is when he gets back home and he sits on the bedside or the couch and Draco stands in front of being the sexy bitch he is and Harry holds him by his waist and opens his buttons and kisses his warm cute stomach.
  • Mhmm I’m tired now again sorry
  • Eat okay? Be good. Drink water.

blog.name: racke7
blog.title: A fanfic author's musings
blog.description: Mostly made to keep track of certain other tumblr accounts, there might also be some personal notes

summary: Prefects of Hogwarts
title: Prefects of Hogwarts
body:
Controversial opinion, but Ron shouldn’t have been a Prefect.

Neither should Harry, or even Hermione.

This is less because of some belief that “Neville deserved the position as a Prefect”, and more because these three socially inept idiots are about as rule-abiding as Peeves.

It’s like, a Prefect is supposed to work as an extension of the authority and aid of a professor. Meaning that they’re supposed to follow the rules, and be generally highly regarded in their House as someone who could be turned to for aid.

Cedric Diggory and Percy Weasley are both excellent examples of Prefects.

Percy might be considered a bit too pompous and rule-abiding, but he’s friendly, hardworking, and always willing to help. With these traits combined, he really is a fantastic pick for a Prefect.

Harry is a snarky little shit who spends nearly as much time in detention as the twins, and has all the friendly charisma of a wet towel. He’s fiercely loyal to those he considers “his”, and in case of danger he always steps up, but outside of that he’ll sit and brood by a windowsill like a particularly scrawny gargoyle. Friendly and approachable he isn’t, and trying to get him to abide by rules he disagrees with is basically impossible.

An excellent hero, and a good-hearted young man through-and-through. But a halfway-decent Prefect he’s not.

In comparison, Ron sticks to Harry like glue, and if there’s a fight in Hogwarts, then odds are pretty good that Ron threw the first punch. He’s a good friend, and despite his terrible studying-habits, he’s not a bad student either. But whilst he’s less likely to break a rule than Harry is, he doesn’t particularly care if he has to break rules in order to punch someone whom he considers deserving of it, and he has a grand temper that flares up with a deceptively cutting tongue.

A kindhearted young man with a fondness for sports, who can be relied upon to protect people in need, but who’ll also casually disregard rules that he doesn’t care about and is about as likely to pretend at spontaneous deafness as he is to actually help a younger student with studying. A good Prefect he really isn’t.

As for Hermione, she’s bossy and perfectly capable of following the rules. She’s also judgmental to the extreme, dangerously vicious to anyone she perceives as an enemy, and about as capable of dealing with people as a cat dunked in a bucket of ice-water. She’s very passionate about studying, but also very unlikely to offer to help someone else with their work, since they’d undoubtedly slow her down. She’s unapproachable in her bossiness, she constantly hangs out with two of the biggest rule-breakers in the castle, she harps on about studying to the extreme, and for all that she disapproves of rule-breaking she’s clearly incapable of keeping either of her friends in check.

A bright young woman with an excellent career ahead of her in anything other than dealing with other people. But whilst she might react badly to seeing someone whom she considers vapid (as in, literally any other girl in the series, because Hermione is like that) elevated to the position of Prefect, she herself is really not Prefect-material.

TL;DR: The trio are a lovely bunch of nutcases, but friendly and rule-abiding they ain’t.


(An argument could be made for Remus Lupin’s stint as a Prefect having been a failed attempt to curtail the Marauders, hoping that the “nicest” of them would be enough to stop the rest of the group, not counting on the fact that Remus is hopelessly bad at saying no to people he likes.)

(James Potter seems like a bit of a long shot for a Prefect when Remus is demoted, until you realize that at this point Sirius has tried to murder someone, and Remus has shown himself as incapable of the task, and Peter is widely known as a bit of a silly doormat. The fact that James takes the position seriously and becomes a good Prefect is mostly down to timing, and various personal realizations from his side of things.)

summary:
Harry: You know 'Mione
Hermione: yeah? 
Harry: I'm not asking much from you here
Hermione: O.. Kay? 
Harry: I'm just asking you...
body:
Harry: You know ‘Mione

Hermione: yeah?

Harry: I’m not asking much from you here

Hermione: O.. Kay?

Harry: I’m just asking you to do this one simple thing, that’s all I ask

Hermione: . …

Harry: Next time if you wanna bang Malfoy just put some silence charm so I can actually sleep

body:
Ok so….HP related!

Anyone that knows me, knows that I’m a huge Harry Potter fan. My house is slytherin and draco malfoy is ❤🔥❤ . Anyway, I started watching Harry Potter last night again for the millionth time and I was curious. So I messed around with the characters and snapchat filters. The results…….

summary: you know that thing where the entire harry potter fandom decided to ignore Cursed Child and made canon that Hufflepuffs are...
body:
you know that thing where the entire harry potter fandom decided to ignore Cursed Child and made canon that Hufflepuffs are great finders based from a parody musical and everyone was ok about it


yeah can we do the same for Game of Thrones and settle that Jaime and Brienne has now eloped to Tarth with their son Podrick

summary:
So that's my characters in hm 
Her name is Irene, my actual name, Holmes (for my insane love for the SH fandom also it sounded...
body:
Hi!

So that’s my characters in hm

Her name is Irene, my actual name, Holmes (for my insane love for the SH fandom also it sounded right soo). I’m at year 5!! Slytherin and so much in love with Charlie, and Penny, and Rowan, and….okay I love them all.

Sooooooooooo Hi! Nice to meet you all!

blog.name: bitingdownpromo
blog.title: Biting Down
blog.description: The year is 2027. The wizarding community is tearing itself apart as danger lurks around every corner; the possibility of a wizarding epidemic sends the community into a frenzy that brings a new evil to power. Will you fight for what you believe, or take the path of least resistance?

summary:
the electronics of your heart...
 The year is 2028. After an incendiary article from Rita Skeeter reporting an increase in...
caption:
the electronics of your heart…

The year is 2028. After an incendiary article from Rita Skeeter reporting an increase in squib births, the wizarding world is tossed into chaos concerning the loss of magical heritage. The renegades vow to protect what’s left of magical blood without caring about the damage along the way. More and more wixen go missing, including the Weasleys’ own Dominique. The Ministry fights within itself as Percy Weasley and Hermione Granger battle for the position of Minister of Magic, tearing the fabric holding wizarding society together.

see how fast they fall apart…

Will you fight for what you believe, or take the path of least resistance? Whether you flee or bite down and take the heat, the next great war is coming and the outcome is up to you. Welcome to Biting Down.

home | plot | rules | wanted connections | character suggestions | application

Our roleplay currently has many canon characters available, such as Victoire Weasley, Freddie Weasley, Lily Potter, Scorpius Malfoy, and both Scamander twins. We also welcome original characters, with lots of surnames available from canon!

.
Drarry. Marauders. Random stuff.
AO3: Ninshadow

summary: can you do wolfstar, 5 and 19?? thank you<3
question: can you do wolfstar, 5 and 19?? thank you<3
answer:
Sorry it’s a bit short!

Innocent innuendo prompt:

5. “I want to taste you.”

19. “I always need to be gagged.”

“I want to taste you.” Remus said, leaning towards a perplexed James.

“Mate?” James asked, backing away slightly.

Sirius laughed and threw his arm around Remus, gaining his attention. “We don’t say things like that to our friends, Moony.”

“What? No, James has chocolate in his shirt pocket.” Remus replied as he closed his eyes and breathed in the scent.

“Give it to him, Prongs, or else he’ll pout all night!” Peter warned as he watched in amusement.

James still looked slightly confused, but handed Remus the chocolate. “I swear you have no filter when it comes to chocolate. It’s like you’re in a trance or something.”

Remus hummed in agreement, his mouth full of the delicious sweet. “Who needs a filter when you have chocolate?”

“I do. Mother says I need to wear a gag while at family get togethers. Apparently everything about me upsets the guests.” Sirius said forlornly.

“Well when I’m around Evans, my very existence upsets her.” James added, his brows furrowed in a frown. “I always need to be gagged.”

All three boys looked at Peter who raised his brows in question. “Everyone thinks I’m adorable, no gag needed here.”

James rolled his eyes but hopped off Sirius’ bed and headed towards his own. “Well apparently I need to sleep, Moony ate my late night snack.”

Peter sighed, but followed suit, heading to his bed. “Wish we had more, I could use a snack.”

Sirius smiled and stretched out leisurely in his bed. “Don’t you dare get up, Moony you’re staying here tonight.”

Remus smirked, while James and Peter both groaned. They were still adjusting to Remus and Sirius’ relationship, the two having only gone public for a few days now. While the sleeping situation was new, Remus had always been close to Sirius and vice versa. The transition from friends to boyfriends went smoother than they’d anticipated, the whole thing feeling natural.

“Wasn’t planning on moving, but could you? You’re literally in the middle of the bed.” Remus said, his smile still in place.

Sirius huffed out a sigh, but moved nonetheless, an eager look on his face. With a lazy flick of his wand the lights went out, leaving them in complete darkness.

When Remus snuggled in for the night, he realised that he only didn’t have a filter when it came to things he loved. Chocolate, books and most important of all: Sirius. If being with Sirius meant him not having a filter, then fuck it. He was the happiest he’d ever been.

Sorry it’s a bit short!
